plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green, but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow tall in the forest
☀️ I need sunshine to live
🍃 I have leaves

plant.question: I'm a fruit that's long and yellow, monkeys love me, and I peel myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favourite food of monkeys
📊 I grow on trees in bunches
🔆 My colour is bright, like the sun

plant.question: I am red, juicy, and grow on a vine. People make sauces and juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often used on pizza
🥗 I am considered by some to be a fruit
❤️ My color is the same as the heart

plant.question: I have a head and a beard, but no face. I grow in the ground, and animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits enjoy eating me
🥕 I am orange, and often eaten raw
👁️ I am good for your eyes

plant.question: I am green, I have seeds, and I come in a pod. People often eat me with rice or meat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I can be cooked or frozen
🟢 I'm round and tiny
🌱 I grow in a long, green jacket

plant.question: I have many layers, like an ogre, but I make you cry. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am round, like an apple
🍔 I am sometimes put on burgers
🔪 Cutting me can be an emotional experience

plant.question: I have a crown of thorns, but I am a sweet treat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I have a scaly skin
🌴 I grow in warm climates
🍕 I am sometimes put on pizza with ham

plant.question: I am a seed in a pod, and when roasted, I make a delicious treat that can be ground into a spread. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I grow underground
🧈 I am often used to make butter
🥪 I'm good in a sandwich with jam

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to make a hot drink. I am grown high up in the mountains and come in many varieties. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I am enjoyed hot
🌎 I am one of the most popular drinks in the world
🌱 My leaves are dried and crushed

plant.question: I am a type of grass that produces grains that can be ground into flour to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am golden in color
🍞 I am used to make bread
🥣 My grains can be made into porridge

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 I am often seen in a circus.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
😴 I sleep a lot.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I have spots.

animal.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs. I love to swim in ponds. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I quack.
🍞 People sometimes feed me bread.
🐣 Baby ones are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🤝 No two of us have the exact same pattern.
🍃 I eat grass.

animal.question: I sleep upside down in caves and fly at night. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I use echolocation.
🌙 I am nocturnal.
🍎 Some of us eat fruit.

animal.question: I build dams and have big front teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I gnaw on wood.
🏠 I live in a lodge.
🌊 I am a rodent.

animal.question: I am a marsupial that hops around Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I carry my young in a pouch.
🥊 I am known for my powerful legs.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I change color to blend in with my surroundings and have a long tongue. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I am a reptile.
👁️ My eyes can move independently.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
